Document.Focus: Coping with cancer - finding the support you need

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Coping with cancer - finding the support you need ?
QAPair.Answer: If you or a loved one has cancer, you may need help with certain practical, financial, and emotional needs. Dealing with cancer can take a toll on your time, emotions, and budget. Support services can help you manage parts of your life affected by cancer. Learn about the types of support you can get along with groups that can help. Some health insurance plans have staff that can help you find support services.
